Name: Yolandita Monge
Img_capt: ''Her 2002 album ''Sexto Sentido'' was produced by the Grammy-nominated Kike Santander, and also has the collaboration of her daughter, the singer Noelia.''
Label: Univision (2006-present),   Ole Music (2005), Warner Music (2002), BMG (1999-2001), WEALatina (1992-1998), Sony (1980-1991)
